game.name: Everhome
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Become a sky architect in this relaxing, cozy, building and management sim. Meet charming characters and design unique houses just for them! Go shopping for new decorations, renovate their homes and discover the keys to their hearts.
